Original title: Lone Survivor
Year: 2013
Duration: 120 min.
Country: United States
Director: Peter Berg
Writer: Peter Berg (Book : Marcus Luttrell )
Music: Steve Jablonsky
Photo: Tobias A. Schliessler
Starring: Mark Wahlberg, Taylor Kitsch, Ben Foster, Emile Hirsch, Alexander Ludwig, Eric Bana, Jerry Ferrara, Scott Elrod, Yousuf Azami, Ali Suliman
Studio: Film 44 / Spikings Entertainment / Weed Road Pictures
Genre: War. Action. Drama | War in Afghanistan. Based on a true story

Synopsis:
---------
Adapted from the memoirs of Marcus Luttrell, who recounts his experiences in Afghanistan during 2005. He (Wahlberg) and other comrades (Kitsch, Foster Hirsch) fared appointed to liquidate a terrorist leader, but the situation was complicated when Taliban ambushed them.

Awards:
-------
2013: Oscar: Nominated for Best Sound and Best Sound Editing
2013: Critics Choice: Best action movie action star (Wahlberg)
2013: National Board of Review (NBR): Best 10 movies of the year
2013: Satellite Awards: Nominated for Best Adapted Screenplay (Lone Survivor)
2013: Screen Actors Guild: Best action Specialists
2013: Writers Guild (WGA): Nominated for Best Adapted Screenplay
